研究表明，DDNS 技术可以减少检测脊髓灰质炎的时间今天（2023 年 8 月 17 日）在《自然微生物学》杂志上发表的一项新研究“使用嵌套 PCR 和纳米孔测序进行敏感脊髓灰质炎病毒检测：一项前瞻性验证研究”证明，使用 DDNS 检测脊髓灰质炎疫情可以为公共卫生当局节省宝贵的时间和金钱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/DDNS-technique-could-reduce-the-time-to-detect-polio-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/DDNS-technique-could-reduce-the-time-to-detect-polio-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=062ef30f-330f-4550-9b7c-6c8d62cea574 Fri, 18 Aug 2023 08:30:40 -0400 DDNS technique could reduce the time to detect polio, study shows
大型制药公司的策略让许多美国人买不起药美国制药巨头今年夏天提起诉讼，以阻止联邦政府在药品价格监管方面的首次努力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/A-peek-at-Big-Pharmae​​28099s-playbook-that-leaves-many-Americans-unable-to-afford-their-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/A-peek-at-Big-Pharmae​​28099s-playbook-that-leaves-many-Americans-unable-to-afford-their-drugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1fafd72-8e00-4549-9ca2-10091777ee48 Fri, 18 Aug 2023 08:24:14 -0400 A peek at Big Pharma’s playbook that leaves many Americans unable to afford their drugs
新的医疗保险提案将涵盖家庭护理人员的培训尽管帕蒂·拉弗勒尔 (Patti LaFleur) 拥有丰富的护理经验，但她对 2021 年 4 月发生的危机毫无准备，当时她的母亲琳达·拉特纳 (Linda LaTurner) 从椅子上摔下来，摔断了臀部。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/A-new-Medicare-proposal-would-cover-training-for-family-caregivers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/A-new-Medicare-proposal-would-cover-training-for-family-caregivers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7a448391-4066-4900-9538-baff4a4e1c98 Fri, 18 Aug 2023 08:22:37 -0400 A new Medicare proposal would cover training for family caregivers
